name: Hear Me Baby, Hold Together (V)
Lore: 'Smuggler and Rebel starships use black market armor plating and deflector shields to withstand enemy fire. Expensive but life-saving modifications.',
Text: 'Take a ''grabber'' into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Sense.)  OR  Play a Defensive Shield from under your Starting Effect.  OR  Cancel Counter Assault, [Virtual Block 2] Defensive Fire, Hidden Weapons, I''d Just As Soon Kiss A Wookiee, or Overload.  OR  Lose 1 Force to cancel Cease Fire (except during a battle at a [Reflections III] site).(Errata Text - September 9th, 2009)',
